document_data.name: Elthure Vildenof
document_data.basicrefs: {{cite web/Astral Encounters/Heroes of Crosswinds Keep Part 2}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Elthure Vildenof''' was a former aspiring [[Red Wizard]] and later member of the [[Stalwart Lions]] as of {{yearlink|1372}}.
document_data.Description: Though much older, he appeared to be in his late fifties, with a gray beard to his midsection and spectacles. He measured 5'8" and weighed {{SI|160|pounds|k|long=yes}}.
document_data.Personality: He felt the spectacles made him look distinguished.
document_data.Abilities: He was familiar with the construction of most categories of [[enchanted]] devices.
document_data.Possessions: Of note, Elthure owned a dusty rose [[ioun stone]], a [[necklace of fireballs]],{{Cite web/Astral Encounters/Crosswinds Keep Upper Floor and Catacombs}}
document_data.Activities: Elthure mostly dedicated himself to magic, and he was available for consulting on others.
document_data.Relationships: He was a member of the Stalwart Lions.
document_data.History: Elthure had aspired to becoming a Red Wizard, but turned his back on the order and suffered a number of assassination attempts as a result. He continued to suffer these attempts until he joined the rest of the Stalwart Lions in the astral, at which point they ceased and he could resume his quest for knowledge. As of {{yearlink|1372}}, he was still in Crosswinds Keep.
